home.welcome: Welcome to German-Arab Chamber of Industry and Commerce
home.withIGCC: Chairperson of the Board of Directors at the IGCC
home.mainDescription: Dr. Nourhan Hassan boasts extensive expertise in governance and consulting. She serves as the Chairperson of the Board of Directors at the International Governance Consulting Center (IGCC) and is a certified international consultant and trainer accredited by the International Compliance and Anti-Money Laundering Organization in England.
home.vision2030: She is also the founder of the Arab Forum for Governance and Sustainable Development and a Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) advisor for numerous companies in Saudi Arabia. Additionally, she chairs the Governance Committee at the New Republic Foundation for Development and is a member of the Egyptian Society for Political Economy and Legislation.
home.heroPragraph: We empower organizations with consulting solutions in governance, compliance, and risk management, with global best practices. Our certified experts deliver cutting-edge training programs to elevate performance and foster institutional excellence in a dynamic world.

programDes.program1: Focuses on establishing effective board structures, ethical decision-making, and accountability frameworks to ensure transparent and sustainable corporate leadership.
programDes.program2: Addresses governance challenges unique to family-owned businesses, including succession planning, conflict resolution, and balancing family dynamics with professional management.
programDes.program3: Covers governance strategies for endowment funds, emphasizing investment oversight, donor compliance, and long-term financial sustainability for institutions.
programDes.program4: Enhances governance in government and public entities, promoting transparency, ethical standards, and efficient public resource management.
programDes.program5: Provides frameworks for managing sports organizations, emphasizing financial accountability, member engagement, and compliance with sporting regulations.
programDes.program6: Trains professionals in board administration, including meeting coordination, regulatory compliance, and stakeholder communication for seamless governance operations.
programDes.program7: Equips board members with skills for strategic oversight, risk management, and ethical leadership to align organizational goals with stakeholder expectations.
programDes.program8: Teaches techniques to detect, prevent, and report financial crimes, ensuring compliance with global AML regulations and safeguarding institutional integrity.
programDes.program9: Prepares organizations to maintain operations during crises through risk assessment, recovery planning, and resilience strategies for disruptions.
programDes.program10: Integrates ESG principles into business strategies to drive sustainability, ethical practices, and measurable social and environmental impact.
programDes.program11: Trains officers to design risk frameworks, identify threats, and implement mitigation strategies aligned with organizational objectives.
programDes.program12: Establishes systematic processes to assess, monitor, and mitigate risks across all levels of an organization for informed decision-making.
programDes.program14: Governs IT systems and data management to align technology with business goals, ensuring security, compliance, and operational efficiency.
programDes.program15: Focuses on governance in healthcare settings, prioritizing patient safety, regulatory adherence, and ethical resource allocation.
programDes.program16: Certifies professionals to develop, implement, and audit compliance programs, ensuring adherence to laws and industry standards.
programDes.program17: Trains auditors to evaluate internal controls, assess risks, and improve governance processes for organizational accountability.
programDes.program18: Develops skills to manage investor communications, financial disclosures, and stakeholder relations to build trust and transparency.
programDes.program19: Combines governance, risk, and compliance into a unified strategy to streamline processes, enhance decision-making, and ensure regulatory alignment.

Footer.footerpragraphs: IGCC Egypt is your go-to for professional consultations in governance and sustainable development with internationally recognized certifications from ICAS.

getInTouch: Get in touch with us for inquiries or support
successDescriptionContact: Thank you for contacting us. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

summit.title: Governance and Sustainable Development Summit
summit.subtitle: Join us for the Arab Governance and Sustainable Development Summit
summit.introduction: The Arab Forum for Governance and Sustainable Development stands as a pioneering platform that brings together experts and decision-makers to discuss the latest trends and strategies in governance and sustainability. The forum aims to enhance transparency, support a sustainable economy, and empower institutions to adopt best practices in achieving comprehensive and sustainable development across the Arab region. We are pleased to announce the convening of the forumâ€™s second edition under the patronage of the Arab League and the International Governance and Project Management Consultancy Center (IGCC), with participation from a select group of experts and thought leaders in governance and sustainable development. ðŸ“Œ An exceptional opportunity to explore cutting-edge insights and strategies, and to strengthen Arab collaboration toward a more sustainable future.
